products.name: Aloe Vera Bar Soap
products.description: Aloe Vera soap: An anti-bacterial healing formula with a blend of vitamin-enriched oils, aloe Vera gel and glycerin. All together give your face a repaired, healthy and smooth appearance. Aloe Vera gel: known for its anti-bacterial and healing properties. Repairs damaged skin caused by drying and cracking from frequent washing. Sanitizes and soothes the skin leaving it clear and healthy. Glycerin:  preserves your skin’s natural moisture making it delicate and smooth.
products.ingredients: Olive oil: penetrates deeply into your skin carrying all the vitamins and antioxidants for a youthful and healthy appearance. Coconut oil: gives the soap its cleansing and moisturizing power. Palm oil: balances between cleansing and conditioning. Fights aging and sunburns. Castor oil: anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory. High levels of vitamin E, minerals, proteins, omega 6 and 9. Reduces black heads. Dissolves and washes away sebum (oily secretions produced by the skin), replacing it with new clean oil.

products.name: Charcoal and Honey Bar Soap
products.description: Our charcoal & honey soap is a super cleansing, anti-aging and moisturizing power; all together in a bar of soap!!! Activated charcoal: absorbs toxins and excess oils. Helps better cleanse the skin. Skin pores become less visible and smaller and blackheads start to disappear. Exfoliate the skin. Honey: known for its moisturizing and antimicrobial qualities. Reduces fine lines and wrinkles to regain a radiant skin. Acts deeply to restore skin elasticity. Glycerin:  preserves your skin’s natural moisture making it delicate and smooth.
products.ingredients: Olive oil: penetrates deeply into your skin carrying all the vitamins and antioxidants for a youthful and healthy appearance. Coconut oil: gives the soap its cleansing and moisturizing power. Palm oil: balances between cleansing and conditioning. Fights aging and sunburns. Castor oil: anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory. High levels of vitamin E, minerals, proteins, omega 6 and 9. Reduces black heads. Dissolves and washes away sebum (oily secretions produced by the skin), replacing it with new clean oil.
